name: indeterminately
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is not exact or fixed: Her eyes were neither blue nor green but positioned somewhere indeterminately between the two. His accent veered indeterminately between Irish and Scottish.
More examplesFewer examplesShe got up onto the platform and waved her hands about indeterminately for a few seconds.He dipped his brush into the paint and dabbed away indeterminately at the canvas.It is a show in which high culture and low culture become indeterminately mixed.
